entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 07:47 AM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 7 except minus 2 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 07:47 AM NST Monday 26 December 2022
